summary:
The Administrative Officer (AO) for Surgical Service inadvertently attached a form containing individually identifiable information to an email The email was sent to five physicians who were being considered for a position within the Medical Center. The form was required as part of the application process. One of the 
physicians contacted the AO and stated the form was not blank and contained personal information. At that time the AO recalled the email. She also sent another email requesting the other physicians to delete the email if they opened it before she initiated the recall action.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
